entry.data:
CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF DRIZZLE
NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 50
CALM WINDS, BECOMING EAST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
TEMPERATURE FALLING TO AROUND 40 IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
